data.eml:eml: Description of a third species in the alpheid shrimp genus Richalpheus Anker & Jeng, 2006 (Crustacea, Decapoda)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur (2011): Description of a third species in the alpheid shrimp genus Richalpheus Anker & Jeng, 2006 (Crustacea, Decapoda). Zootaxa 3059: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278924
